metadata.title: CVE-2023-44443 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
[GIMP PSP File Parsing Integer Overflow Remote Code ExecutionVulnerability]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44443` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.10.18-1
gimp-data - 2.10.18-1
libgimp2.0 - 2.10.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.10.18-1').
